fields.label: PROCEDURE Activate IF DODEFAULT()    thisform.well_on_hold()    thisform.loadleases()    IF wells.cstate = 'WV'       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.Enabled = .t.    ELSE       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.Enabled = .f.    ENDIF  ENDIF     ENDPROC PROCEDURE beforeclose LPARAMETERS nclosereason  IF THISFORM.lchanged AND NOT thisform.isnew('Wells')     IF EMPTY(THISFORM.txtWellid.VALUE) OR EMPTY(THISFORM.txtWellname.VALUE)         THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('You cannot save a well record with a blank name or ID.  Please correct before proceeding.')         RETURN .F.     ENDIF ENDIF  DODEFAULT(nclosereason)  ENDPROC PROCEDURE changeuserlabels IF DODEFAULT()    DO CASE       CASE wells.cstate = 'OK'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser1.CAPTION = 'PUN No'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser2.CAPTION = 'Prod Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.CAPTION = 'Disp Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser4.CAPTION = 'Oper Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser5.CAPTION = 'Oper Name'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser6.CAPTION = 'BTU Factor'       CASE wells.cstate = 'WY'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser1.CAPTION = 'Rpt Group'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser2.CAPTION = 'Rate Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.CAPTION = 'User 3'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser4.CAPTION = 'User 4'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser5.CAPTION = 'User 5'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser6.CAPTION = 'User 6'       CASE wells.cstate = 'LA'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser1.CAPTION = 'Parish No'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser2.CAPTION = 'Taxpayer Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.CAPTION = 'Tax Rate Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser4.CAPTION = 'Excl Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser5.CAPTION = 'Excl Rate'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser6.CAPTION = 'LUW Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lblPermit6.CAPTION = 'Serial #'       CASE wells.cstate = 'OH'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser1.CAPTION = 'Storage Tanks'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser2.CAPTION = 'Max Capacity'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.CAPTION = 'User 3'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser4.CAPTION = 'User 4'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser5.CAPTION = 'User 5'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser6.CAPTION = 'User 6'       CASE wells.cstate = 'TX'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser1.CAPTION = 'Oil Disp Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser2.CAPTION = 'Gas Disp Code'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.CAPTION = 'User 3'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser4.CAPTION = 'User 4'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser5.CAPTION = 'User 5'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser6.CAPTION = 'User 6'       OTHERWISE          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser1.CAPTION = 'User 1'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser2.CAPTION = 'User 2'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.CAPTION = 'User 3'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser4.CAPTION = 'User 4'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser5.CAPTION = 'User 5'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser6.CAPTION = 'User 6'    ENDCASE      DO CASE       CASE wells.cstate = 'WY'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.cmdWYOGCCButton.VISIBLE = .T.          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.CmdWVDataButton.VISIBLE = .F.          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.REFRESH()       CASE wells.cstate = 'WV'          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.CmdWVDataButton.VISIBLE = .T.          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.cmdWYOGCCButton.VISIBLE = .F.          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.REFRESH()        OTHERWISE * Code for all other cases or states          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.cmdWYOGCCButton.VISIBLE = .F.          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.CmdWVDataButton.VISIBLE = .F.          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.REFRESH() * Hide or reset other state-specific controls as well    ENDCASE         THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser1.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser2.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser4.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser5.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser6.ALIGNMENT = 0 ENDIF  ENDPROC PROCEDURE chkrefresh WITH THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3    IF wells.lcompress       .txtnCompress.lenabled = .T.    ELSE       .txtnCompress.lenabled = .F.    ENDIF     IF wells.lgather       .txtnGather.lenabled = .T.    ELSE       .txtnGather.lenabled = .F.    ENDIF ENDWITH ENDPROC PROCEDURE enablepermits TRY    DO CASE       CASE wells.nwellcount = 1          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit6.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit5.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit4.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit3.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit2.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit1.lEnabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 2          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit6.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit5.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit4.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit3.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit2.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit1.lEnabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 3          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit6.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit5.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit4.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit3.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit2.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit1.lEnabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 4          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit6.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit5.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit4.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit3.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit2.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit1.lEnabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 5          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit6.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit5.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit4.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit3.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit2.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit1.lEnabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 6          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit6.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit5.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit4.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit3.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit2.lEnabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit1.lEnabled = .T.    ENDCASE     DO CASE       CASE wells.nwellcount = 1          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra6.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra5.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra4.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra3.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra2.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra1.lenabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 2          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra6.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra5.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra4.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra3.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra2.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra1.lenabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 3          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra6.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra5.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra4.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra3.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra2.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra1.lenabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 4          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra6.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra5.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra4.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra3.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra2.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra1.lenabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 5          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra6.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra5.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra4.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra3.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra2.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra1.lenabled = .T.       CASE wells.nwellcount = 6          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra6.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra5.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra4.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra3.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra2.lenabled = .T.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra1.lenabled = .T.    ENDCASE CATCH TO loError    MESSAGEBOX('Error: ' + loerror.message + CHR(13) + ;               'Line:  ' + TRANSFORM(loerror.lineno),16,'Error') ENDTRY  ENDPROC PROCEDURE Init LPARAMETERS lcWellID  IF DODEFAULT()    IF FILE('datafiles\northwood.txt')       THISFORM.lnorthwood = .T.       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.CAPTION = 'Tank #'    ENDIF        IF VARTYPE(lcWellID) = 'C'       swselect('wells')       SEEK(lcWellID)    ENDIF     THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.cmdWYOGCCButton.VISIBLE = .F.    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.CmdWVDataButton.VISIBLE = .F.     THISFORM.loadleases() ENDIF  ENDPROC PROCEDURE list LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lcList, lnRecNo, llDontMove PRIV llOK  IF thisform.lnorthwood    thisform.listnorthwood()    RETURN ENDIF   llOK = .F. llDontMove = .F.  lcList = 'cwellid,cwellname,cgroup,cwellstat'  SELECT wells lnRecNo = RECNO()  IF thisform.cmdatamanager.isnew('Wells')    llDontMove = .T. ENDIF  IF this.flushcontrolbuffer() AND this.beforenav('Wells')    DO FORM custom\picklist WITH 'Wells', lcList, thisform.txtwellid.value, 4 ELSE    RETURN     ENDIF     IF NOT llOK    IF NOT llDontMove       TRY           SELECT wells          GOTO lnRecNo       CATCH       ENDTRY     ENDIF     ELSE    thisform.lrunafternav = .t.     THISFORM.cmdatamanager.afternav('Wells')    thisform.loadleases() ENDIF     THISFORM.REFRESH()         ENDPROC PROCEDURE listnorthwood LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lcList, lnRecNo, llDontMove PRIV llOK  llOK = .F. llDontMove = .F.  lcList = 'cwellid,cwellname,cpermit1,ccounty,ctownship,cgroup,cwellstat'  SELECT wells lnRecNo = RECNO()  IF thisform.cmdatamanager.isnew('Wells')    llDontMove = .T. ENDIF         IF this.flushcontrolbuffer() AND this.beforenav('Wells')    DO FORM custom\picklist WITH 'Wells', lcList, thisform.txtwellid.value, 7 ELSE    RETURN     ENDIF     IF NOT llOK    IF NOT llDontMove       TRY           SELECT wells          GOTO lnRecNo       CATCH       ENDTRY     ENDIF     ELSE    thisform.lrunafternav = .t.    THISFORM.cmdatamanager.afternav('Wells')    thisform.loadleases() ENDIF     THISFORM.REFRESH()         ENDPROC PROCEDURE loadleases LOCAL lcWellID, llAlarm  llAlarm = .f.  * Clear the list before starting THISFORM.lstleases.CLEAR()  lcWellID = wells.cwellid lnI      = 1 SWSELECT('leasewell') SCAN FOR cwellid == lcWellID 	m.cLeaseID = cLeaseID 	SELECT land 	SET ORDER TO cLeaseID 	IF SEEK(m.cLeaseID) 		m.cLeaseName = cLeaseName 		THISFORM.lstleases.ADDLISTITEM(m.cLeaseID + ' - ' + m.cLeaseName, lnI, 1) 		lnI = lnI + 1 		IF land.lLegal 		   IF NOT llAlarm               MESSAGEBOX("There's a legal matter pending for the " + ALLTRIM(land.cleasename) + " lease! See the lease notes.",48,'Legal Matter Pending')               llAlarm = .t.            ENDIF         ENDIF  	ENDIF ENDSCAN   ENDPROC PROCEDURE purchaserdesc IF NOT EMPTY(wells.crevbbl)    SELECT revsrc    LOCATE FOR crevkey = wells.crevbbl    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtoilproddesc.VALUE = crevname    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtoilproddesc.REFRESH() ELSE    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtoilproddesc.VALUE = ''    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtoilproddesc.REFRESH() ENDIF  IF NOT EMPTY(wells.crevmcf)    SELECT revsrc    LOCATE FOR crevkey = wells.crevmcf    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtgasproddesc.VALUE = crevname    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtgasproddesc.REFRESH() ELSE    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtgasproddesc.VALUE = ''    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtgasproddesc.REFRESH() ENDIF  SELECT wells ENDPROC PROCEDURE setstate this.lChanged = .T. m.goStateManager.RefreshAll('Form Edit') ENDPROC PROCEDURE viewdocument LOCAL lnReturn, llReturn, lcOutputFile LOCAL liKey, lcPath  liKey = INT(VAL(thisform.pgfpageframe1.page6.lstDocuments.value))  swselect('documents') SET ORDER TO iDocPK IF SEEK(liKey)    lcOutputFile = cPath      llReturn = .T.     IF NOT FILE(lcOutputFile)       llReturn = .F.    ENDIF     TRY       IF llReturn          DECLARE INTEGER ShellExecute IN "Shell32.dll" ;             INTEGER HWND, ;             STRING lpVerb, ;             STRING lpFile, ;             STRING lpParameters, ;             STRING lpDirectory, ;             LONG nShowCmd           lnReturn = ShellExecute(0, "Open", lcOutputFile, "", "", 1)       ENDIF        THIS.nReturnValue = lnReturn        IF lnReturn > 32          llReturn = .T.       ELSE          llReturn = .F.       ENDIF    CATCH TO loError    ENDTRY     RETURN (llReturn)  ENDIF ENDPROC PROCEDURE viewmap * ShowWindow flag. See complete list below. #DEFINE SW_SHOWNORMAL 1  LOCAL lnReturn, llReturn, lcURL lcWellName = ALLTRIM(wells.cwellname) lcLatitude = wells.clatitude lcLongitude = wells.clongitude  IF EMPTY(lcLatitude)    lcLatitude = '40.001658'    lcLongitude = '-83.019755'    lcWellname = 'The Ohio State University' ENDIF      lcWellName = STRTRAN(lcwellname,'#','') lcWellName = STRTRAN(lcWellName,' ','+')     lcURL = 'http://maps.google.com/maps?q=' + ALLTRIM(lclatitude) + ',+' + ALLTRIM(lclongitude) + '+(' + ;    lcwellname + ')&iwloc=A&hl=en'   llReturn = .T.  TRY    IF llReturn       DECLARE INTEGER ShellExecute IN "Shell32.dll" ;          INTEGER HWND, ;          STRING lpVerb, ;          STRING lpFile, ;          STRING lpParameters, ;          STRING lpDirectory, ;          LONG nShowCmd        lnReturn = ShellExecute(0, "Open", lcURL, "", "", 1)    ENDIF     THIS.nReturnValue = lnReturn     IF lnReturn > 32       llReturn = .T.    ELSE       llReturn = .F.    ENDIF CATCH TO loError ENDTRY  RETURN (llReturn)     ENDPROC PROCEDURE well_on_hold * * Checks the wellinv table to see if all owners are marked on hold * LOCAL lnHolds lnHolds = 0  swselect('wellinv') SCAN FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND NOT lonHold     swselect('investor')    SET ORDER to cownerid    IF SEEK(wellinv.cownerid) AND NOT lIntegGL       lnHolds = lnHolds + 1    ENDIF  ENDSCAN   swselect('wellinv') COUNT FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid TO lnInts  IF lnHolds = 0 AND lnInts > 0    llHeld = .T. ELSE    llHeld = .F. ENDIF  IF llHeld    THISFORM.cmdHold.CAPTION = 'Release Well' ELSE    THISFORM.cmdHold.CAPTION = 'Suspend Well' ENDIF     ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.afternav LPARAMETERS cworkarea  IF m.cworkarea = 'Wells' AND THISFORM.lrunafternav    lcWellID = wells.cWellID    THISFORM.CAPTION = 'Well Information - (' + ALLTRIM(wells.cwellname) + ')'    THISFORM.chkrefresh()    THISFORM.purchaserdesc()    THISFORM.ChangeUserLabels()     IF m.goapp.lDocuments       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page6.lstDocuments.REQUERY()    ENDIF     = REQUERY('well_owners')    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page3.cboOwnerID.CLEAR()    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page3.cboOwnerID.REQUERY()    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page3.cboOwnerID.REFRESH()  * Load in the leases attached to this well    THISFORM.LoadLeases()     IF wells.lusesev = .T.  &&  Marked to use these rates insted of severance tax table, so enable the rate boxes       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtNroysevo.SET('enabled', .T.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnroysevg.SET('enabled', .T.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnwrksevo.SET('enabled', .T.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnwrksevg.SET('enabled', .T.)    ELSE       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtNroysevo.SET('enabled', .F.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnroysevg.SET('enabled', .F.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnwrksevo.SET('enabled', .F.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnwrksevg.SET('enabled', .F.)    ENDIF  * Enable/Disable API Numbers and NRA Numbers    THISFORM.EnablePermits()     THISFORM.coldgroup = wells.cgroup     IF wells.cstate = 'WV'       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page7.ENABLED = .T.    ELSE       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page7.ENABLED = .F.       IF THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.ACTIVEPAGE = 7          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.ACTIVEPAGE = 1       ENDIF    ENDIF      THISFORM.well_on_hold()  *!*	   swselect('Notes') *!*	   SET ORDER to cLeaseID *!*	   lcLeaseID = land.cleaseid *!*	   IF SEEK(lcLeaseID) *!*	      thisform.pgfpageframecustom1.page4.edtnOtes.Refresh() *!*	   ELSE *!*	      m.cLeaseID = lcLeaseID *!*	      m.mNotes = ' ' *!*	      INSERT INTO notes FROM Memvar *!*	      thisform.pgfpageframecustom1.Page4.edtNotes.Refresh() *!*	   ENDIF     THISFORM.lrunafternav = .F.     IF NOT wells.lsev1o       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.check1.SET('Enabled',.T.)    ELSE       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.check1.SET('Enabled',.F.)    ENDIF    IF NOT wells.lsev1g       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.Check2.SET('Enabled',.T.)    ELSE       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.Check2.SET('Enabled',.F.)    ENDIF ENDIF  RETURN .T.  ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.afternew LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lcgroup lcgroup = '00'  SELECT groups  &&  Don't fill in 00 as the group when adding a new record if they've been dumb, and deleted it.  Instead, just use the first group in the list. LOCATE FOR cGroup = '00' AND NOT DELETED() IF NOT FOUND()    SET ORDER TO cGroup    GO TOP    lcgroup = cGroup ENDIF SELECT wells  WITH THISFORM.PGFPAGEFRAME1    THISFORM.cmdatamanager.REPLACE('wells','cmeterid','')    .page2.txtcmeterid.REFRESH    REPLACE cwellid   WITH '', ;       cwellname WITH '', ;       lthird_prty WITH .F., ;       lcompress   WITH .F., ;       lGather     WITH .F., ;       lSection29  WITH .F., ;       nprocess    WITH 1, ;       nwellcount  WITH 1, ;       cwellstat   WITH 'A', ;       cGroup      WITH lcgroup, ;       dAdded      WITH DATETIME(), ;       caddedby    WITH m.goapp.cuser    .page3.txtnCompress.lENABLED = .F.    .page3.txtnGather.lENABLED = .F.    .page3.txtoilproddesc.VALUE = ''    .page3.txtoilproddesc.REFRESH()    .page3.txtgasproddesc.VALUE = ''    .page3.txtgasproddesc.REFRESH()    .page1.REFRESH()    .page2.REFRESH()    .page3.REFRESH()    .page4.REFRESH()    .page5.REFRESH()    IF m.goapp.lDocuments       .page6.REFRESH()    ENDIF        .ACTIVEPAGE = 1    THISFORM.SetNextControl(thisform.txtwellid) ENDWITH RETURN .T.  ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.beforedelete LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lcWellID, lnCount  if not used('expense')    use expense in 0 endif    SELECT expense LOCATE FOR cWellID == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been expenses entered using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  if not used('income')    use income in 0 endif    SELECT income LOCATE FOR cWellID == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been income entered using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  if not used('glmaster')    use glmaster in 0 endif    SELECT glmaster LOCATE FOR cUnitNo == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been journal entries posted using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  if not used('disbhist')    use disbhist in 0 endif    SELECT disbhist LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been history entries made using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  if not used('suspense')    use suspense in 0 endif    SELECT suspense LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been suspense entries made using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  lcWellId = wells.cwellid =REQUERY('well_owners') SELECT well_owners COUNT FOR NOT DELETED() TO lnCount IF lnCount <> 0    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There has been division of interests created for this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  RETURN dodefault(cworkarea)   ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.beforenav LPARAMETERS cWorkarea     thisform.lrunafternav = .t. ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.beforenew LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lnWells   lnwells = 0 swselect('wells', 'wells1') SELECT wells1 COUNT FOR NOT DELETED() AND cwellstat <> 'U' TO lnwells IF lnwells = m.goapp.nWells    MESSAGEBOX('There is a maximum of ' + TRANSFORM(m.goapp.nWells) + ' in this edition of Pivoten Financials allowed. ' + CHR(10) + ;         'You cannot add additional wells until you upgrade to the next level.', 0, THISFORM.CAPTION)    RETURN .F. ENDIF    ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.beforeupdate LPARAMETERS cworkarealist  IF m.goapp.lQBVersion    SELECT wells1    COUNT FOR NOT DELETED() AND cwellstat <> 'U' TO lnwells    IF m.goApp.capplevel = 'Basic' AND lnwells > 20       IF wells.cwellstat <> 'U'          MESSAGEBOX('This is a basic version. 20 wells is the maximum number of wells allowed. ' + CHR(10) + ;          'You cannot add additional wells until you upgrade to the next level.',0,'Basic Version')          RETURN .F.       ENDIF     ENDIF ENDIF      IF THISFORM.coldgroup <> wells.cgroup    IF NOT USED('suspense')       USE suspense IN 0    ENDIF    SELECT suspense    COUNT FOR cWellID == wells.cWellID AND cgroup == THISFORM.coldgroup TO lnx    IF lnx > 0       IF THISFORM.omessage.CONFIRM('This well has suspense entries associated with group: ' + THISFORM.coldgroup + ;             ' Changing the group will affect the suspense balances reported when past owner statements are reprinted.' + ;             ' Do you want to continue and change those entries to this new group: ' + wells.cgroup+'?')          SELECT suspense          SCAN FOR suspense.cWellID == wells.cWellID AND suspense.cgroup == THISFORM.coldgroup             REPLACE cgroup WITH wells.cgroup          ENDSCAN       ELSE          THISFORM.omessage.warning('The changes were not saved.')          RETURN .F.       ENDIF    ENDIF ENDIF  IF NOT this.isnew('Wells')    SELECT wells    REPLACE dchanged WITH DATETIME(), ;            cChangedBy WITH m.goapp.cuser ENDIF                         THISFORM.coldgroup = wells.cgroup  &&  When saved, set the cOldGroup variable, so if they change the group for a well multiple times without changing recs, it will work  RETURN .T.  ENDPROC

ENDIF        ENDPROC PROCEDURE Page6.Activate IF m.goApp.lCloudDocs    this.cmdTreeno.Visible = .t. ELSE    this.cmdTreeno.Visible = .f. fields.name: cmdLookMeter
fields.label: PROCEDURE Click local nMeterNo  nMeterNo = thisform.nMeterNo  LOCAL lcList, lnRecNo PRIV llOK  IF TYPE('nMeterNo') <> 'N'    nMeterNo = 1 ENDIF  DO CASE    CASE nMeterNo = 1       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID.VALUE    CASE nMeterNo = 2       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID2.VALUE    CASE nMeterNo = 3       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID3.VALUE       CASE nMeterNo = 4       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID4.VALUE      CASE nMeterNo = 5       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID5.VALUE       OTHERWISE       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID.VALUE ENDCASE  llOK = .F. lcList = 'cmeterid/meterid,cmeterdesc/meterdesc'  DO FORM picklist WITH 'Meters', lcList, lcValue, 2  IF llOK    DO CASE       CASE nMeterNo = 1          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)       CASE nMeterNo = 2          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID2.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)       CASE nMeterNo = 3          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID3.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)       CASE nMeterNo = 4          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID4.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)          CASE nMeterNo = 5          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID5.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)          OTHERWISE              THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)    ENDCASE ENDIF   ENDPROC

fields.name: chkThird_prty
fields.label: PROCEDURE Click IF this.value AND NOT EMPTY(wells.cTable)  &&  Don't let them mark this option if they've got a tax table    messagebox('You cannot mark this option because this well has a tax table assigned to it, ' + ;               'which means you are not liable for paying the taxes being withheld. The original ' + ;               'operator will have withheld the taxes before the revenue was received.',16,'Option Conflict')    this.set('value',.f.)    return ENDIF  IF this.Value    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev1O',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev2O',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev3O',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev4O',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev1G',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev2G',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev3G',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev4G',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev1P',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev2P',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev3P',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lSev4P',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lDirOilPurch',.T.)    thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','lDirGasPurch',.T.) ELSE    thisform.omessage.display('Be sure to check the tax options to make sure they are setup correctly for this well.') ENDIF      DODEFAULT()  ENDPROC

fields.label: PROCEDURE Click IF wells.lusesev AND this.value    IF thisform.omessage.confirm('This well is marked to use the rates specified below. These rates override the tax 1 calculations ' + ;                                 'for oil & gas. Do you want to continue to mark the well as exempt from tax 1 which will zero out the rates?')       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lusesev',.f.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','nroysevo',0)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','nroysevg',0)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','nwrksevo',0)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','nwrksevg',0)       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.chkTaxexempt1.Refresh()       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.txtnroysevo.Refresh()       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.txtnroysevg.Refresh()       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.txtnwrksevo.Refresh()       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.txtnwrksevg.Refresh()    ELSE       this.Value = .f.    ENDIF  ENDIF  DODEFAULT() ENDPROC

fields.name: chkLusesev
fields.label: PROCEDURE Click  IF wells.ltaxexempt1 AND this.value    IF thisform.omessage.confirm('This well is marked exempt from tax 1. These rates override the tax 1 calculations ' + ;                                 'for oil & gas. Do you want to do this and mark the well as non exempt from tax 1?')       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Ltaxexempt1',.f.)       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page5.chkTaxexempt1.Refresh()    ELSE       this.Value = .f.    ENDIF  ENDIF   IF THIS.VALUE AND NOT EMPTY(wells.cTable)  &&  Already a tax table specified, so warn them, and don't let them choose it    messagebox('There is a tax table assigned to this well. This option ' + ;               'will replace the tax table tax 1 calculation for oil & gas. ' + ;               'This option should normally only be used for calculating ' + ;               'Montana tribal taxes.',48,'Important tax calculation information') ENDIF  IF this.Parent.chkroysevtx.value    MESSAGEBOX('This option cannot be enabled when the option to exempt royalty owners from taxes is enabled.',16,'Conflicting Option')    this.Value = .f. ENDIF   IF THIS.VALUE    THIS.PARENT.txtnroysevo.ENABLED = .T.    THIS.PARENT.txtnroysevg.ENABLED = .T.    THIS.PARENT.txtnwrksevo.ENABLED = .T.    THIS.PARENT.txtnwrksevg.ENABLED = .T. ELSE    THIS.PARENT.txtnroysevo.ENABLED = .F.    THIS.PARENT.txtnroysevg.ENABLED = .F.    THIS.PARENT.txtnwrksevo.ENABLED = .F.    THIS.PARENT.txtnwrksevg.ENABLED = .F. ENDIF    ENDPROC

fields.name: cmdTreeno
fields.label: PROCEDURE Click LOCAL loTS  loTS = m.goApp.oTreeno  IF loTS.Login()    * Get the cabinet ID, needed for the other calls    lnCabinetID = loTS.GetCabinetID("Wells") && ex. "Leases", "Wells"     IF m.lnCabinetID = -1       MESSAGEBOX('Error Accessing Treeno:' + CHR(10) + loTS.cErrorMsg,48,'Treeno Problem')       RETURN    ENDIF     * Check to see if the folder already exists    * Not a great example because if you did a search for a company named "Test"    * a company like "Test Company" would match. The assumption is this    * field contains a unique value. If that ends up being a bad assumption    * you could iterate over the loTS.oMatches and do a more exact match.    *lnMatches = loTS.SearchCabinet(lnCabinetID, "company_name", "Test Company") && ex. lease_number or well_id    lnMatches = loTS.SearchCabinet(lnCabinetID, "well_id", wells.cwellid) && ex. lease_number or well_id     IF lnMatches = -1       MESSAGEBOX('Error Accessing Treeno:' + CHR(10) + loTS.cErrorMsg,48,'Treeno Problem')       RETURN    ENDIF     * If the folder doesn't exist, create it    IF lnMatches = 0       * Folder Not found       IF MESSAGEBOX('The folder for well: ' + wells.cwellid + ' does not exist in Treeno. Do you want to create it?',36,'Access Treeno') = 6          CREATE CURSOR curfolder (well_id C(10), well_name C(40), api_number C(20), county C(30), township C(20), status C(1), lease_id c(10))          SWSELECT('leasewell')          SELECT cLeaseID FROM leasewell WHERE  cwellid == wells.cwellid INTO CURSOR templease ORDER BY cleaseid          INSERT INTO curfolder (well_id, well_name, api_number, county, township, status, lease_id) ;             VALUES (wells.cwellid, wells.cwellname, wells.cpermit1, wells.ccounty, wells.ctownship, wells.cwellstat, templease.cleaseid)           llCreated = loTS.CreateFolder(thisform.DataSessionId, m.lnCabinetID, "curFolder")           IF !m.llCreated             MESSAGEBOX('Error Accessing Treeno:' + CHR(10) + loTS.cErrorMsg,48,'Treeno Problem')          ENDIF       ELSE          RETURN       ENDIF    ENDIF     swselect('options')    GO TOP     lcUser = ALLTRIM(cTreenoUser)    lcPassword = ALLTRIM(cmEncrypt(options.cTreenoPwd,'SherWareKey_@8@2899909'))    * Now open the website up to this folder    loTS.LaunchWebsite(lcUser, lcPassword, "Wells", "well_id", wells.cwellid) ELSE    MESSAGEBOX('Unable to login to Treeno. Check your user name and password in the Cloud Doc Mgmt preferences and try again.',16,'Treeno Login Problem')       ENDIF  ENDPROC

Would you like to view the existing record?')             THISFORM.cmdatamanager.revertall()             SELECT wells             SET ORDER TO cwellid             SEEK(lcWellID)             THISFORM.REFRESH()          ELSE             THIS.VALUE = ''             RETURN 0          ENDIF       ELSE          THISFORM.cmdatamanager.revertall()          SELECT wells          SET ORDER TO cwellid          SEEK(lcWellID)          SCATTER MEMVAR BLANK MEMO          GATHER MEMVAR MEMO          RECALL          THIS.SET('value',lcWellID)          REPLACE nprocess    WITH 1, ;             cwellstat   WITH 'A', ;             cGroup      WITH '00'          THISFORM.REFRESH()       ENDIF       SELECT wells    ENDIF ENDIF  SET DELETED ON  RETURN DODEFAULT()    ENDPROC

fields.name: cboTable
fields.label: PROCEDURE Requery IF DODEFAULT()    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('  ',1)     SELECT cTable FROM sevtax INTO ARRAY laTaxes     IF _TALLY > 0       FOR lnX = 1 TO _TALLY          THIS.ADDLISTITEM(laTaxes[lnX],lnX+1)       ENDFOR       this.Refresh()    ENDIF ENDIF  ENDPROC PROCEDURE Valid IF DODEFAULT()     *Don't let them have both a tax table, and the option about using the rates instead of a tax table marked    IF NOT EMPTY(this.Value) AND wells.lUseSev         thisform.oMessage.Warning('You currently have the option marked on the Taxes tab to specify the rates instead of using a tax table.  In order to select a tax table, first un-mark that option.')       this.set('value','')          ENDIF        * Don't let them set this option if it's a 3rd party well    IF NOT EMPTY(this.value) AND wells.lThird_prty         THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('You cannot specify a tax table for this well because it is marked as a 3rd party well, which means you are not liable for paying the taxes being withheld.')       this.set('value','')    ENDIF     IF NOT EMPTY(this.Value) AND ;       (wells.lsev1o OR wells.lsev2o OR wells.lsev3o OR wells.lsev4o OR ;        wells.lsev1g OR wells.lsev2g OR wells.lsev3g OR wells.lsev4g OR ;        wells.lsev1p OR wells.lsev2p OR wells.lsev3p OR wells.lsev4p)              thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev1o',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev2o',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev3o',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev4o',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev1g',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev2g',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev3g',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev4g',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev1p',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev2p',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev3p',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev4p',.F.)    ENDIF     ENDIF        ENDPROC

fields.name: cboStatus
fields.label: PROCEDURE Init THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Active',1,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('A',1,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Inactive',2,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('I',2,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Plugged',3,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('P',3,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Sold',4,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('S',4,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Shut In',5,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('N',5,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Permitted',6,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('T',6,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Spudded',7,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('D',7,2)  IF m.goApp.lAMVersion    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Investment',8,1)    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('V',8,2) ENDIF  IF m.goapp.lQBVersion    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Not Used',8,1)    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('U',8,2) ENDIF      THIS.REFRESH()  DODEFAULT() ENDPROC PROCEDURE Valid LOCAL llFound  IF INLIST(THIS.VALUE,'I','V','S','P') AND INLIST(wells.cWellStat,'A','N','T','D')  &&  If changing it from active to some other status, check the allocation files and new run, and warn them if there's items in there     SELECT expsusp    LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND NOT DELETED()    IF FOUND()       llFound = .T.    ENDIF    SELECT incsusp    LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND NOT DELETED()    IF FOUND()       llFound = .T.    ENDIF    IF llFound = .T.       THISFORM.oMessage.Warning("You are changing this well from being an active well, but there is income or expenses in the allocation file which won't get processed unless the well is active.")    ENDIF     llFound = .F.    SELECT income    LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND nrunno = 0    IF FOUND()       llFound = .T.    ENDIF    SELECT expense    LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND nrunnorev = 0 AND nrunnojib = 0 AND cyear <> 'FIXD'    IF FOUND()       llFound = .T.    ENDIF    IF llFound = .T.       THISFORM.oMessage.Warning("You are changing this well from being an active well, but there is income or expenses in the New Run which won't get processed unless the well is active.")    ENDIF ENDIF  * Warn the user that chaning a well to a status of "Not Used" is irreversible IF THIS.VALUE = 'U'    IF NOT THISFORM.oMessage.CONFIRM('Changing the well status to Not Used locks this well. It cannot be changed back to active. Do you want to continue?')       this.refresh()       RETURN .F.    ENDIF ENDIF  * Can't change the well status of Not Used to anything else. IF THIS.VALUE <> 'U' AND wells.cWellStat = 'U'    THISFORM.oMessage.severe('A well marked as Not Used cannot be changed to any other status.')    this.refresh()    RETURN .F. ENDIF  IF THIS.Value = 'V' AND wells.cwellstat # 'V'    MESSAGEBOX("Investment wells do not flow through a Revenue Distribution or Joint Interest Billing. " + ;               "They are wells you don't operate and don't set up a DOI for." + ;               "In order to get some of the well reports for an investment well you'll need to run " + ;               "the Build History for Investment Wells found under the Utilities menu.",48,thisform.Caption) ENDIF                  DODEFAULT()  ENDPROC

fields.name: cmdLease
fields.label: PROCEDURE Click LOCAL m.cWellID  m.cWellID = thisform.txtwellid.Value   DO FORM dmsellease WITH m.cWellID  SELECT leasesel COUNT FOR NOT DELETED() TO lnCount        IF lnCount > 0    SELECT cLeaseID, .F. as lExists FROM leasesel INTO CURSOR leaselink readwrite        * Find out if lease is already attached to this well    SELECT leaselink    SCAN        SCATTER MEMVAR        SELECT leasewell       LOCATE FOR cwellid == m.cwellid AND cleaseid == m.cleaseid       IF FOUND()          SELECT leaselink          REPLACE lExists WITH .t.       ENDIF    ENDSCAN      * Only add leases not already attached    SELECT leaselink    SCAN FOR NOT lExists       SCATTER MEMVAR        INSERT INTO leasewell FROM memvar    ENDSCAN        * Remove leases no longer attached to this well    SWSELECT('leasewell')    SCAN FOR cwellid == m.cwellid       m.cLeaseID = cLeaseID       SELECT leaselink       LOCATE FOR cLeaseID == m.cLeaseID       IF NOT FOUND()          SELECT leasewell          DELETE NEXT 1       ENDIF    ENDSCAN         thisform.lstleases.Clear()        lnI = 1    SWSELECT('leasewell')    SCAN FOR cWellID == m.cWellID       m.cLeaseID = cLeaseID       SELECT land       SET ORDER to cLeaseID       IF SEEK(m.cLeaseID)          m.cLeaseName = cLeaseName          thisform.lstLeases.AddListItem(m.cLeaseID + ' - ' + m.cLeaseName,lnI,1)          lnI = lnI + 1       ENDIF    ENDSCAN     thisform.setstate() ELSE    swselect('leasewell')    DELETE FOR cwellid == m.cWellID    thisform.setstate()       ENDIF  ENDPROC

fields.name: cmdHold
fields.label: PROCEDURE Click swselect('investor') SET ORDER TO cownerid swselect('wellinv',.T.) IF THIS.CAPTION = 'Suspend Well'    IF THISFORM.omessage.CONFIRM('This will mark all owner interests as held in the division of interests for this well. Continue?')       SELECT wellinv       SCAN FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid          SELECT investor          IF SEEK(wellinv.cownerid) AND linteggl             LOOP          ENDIF          SELECT wellinv          REPLACE lonhold WITH .T.       ENDSCAN       TABLEUPDATE(.T.)       MESSAGEBOX('All interests in this well have been placed on hold. ' + CHR(10) + CHR(10) +;          'Changing the division of interests manually by taking ' + CHR(10) + ;          'an interest off hold will change this button to say ' + CHR(10) + ;          '"Suspend Well" again.',64,'Release Well')    ENDIF ELSE    IF THISFORM.omessage.CONFIRM('This will mark all owner interests as not held in the division of interests for this well. Continue?')       SELECT wellinv        SCAN FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid          REPLACE lonhold WITH .F.       ENDSCAN       TABLEUPDATE(.T.)       MESSAGEBOX('All interests in this well have been taken off hold. ' + CHR(10) + CHR(10) +;          'Changing the division of interests manually by placing ' + CHR(10) + ;          'an interest on hold will change this button to say ' + CHR(10) + ;          '"Release Well" again.',64,'Release Well')    ENDIF ENDIF  THISFORM.well_on_hold()  ENDPROC

THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.REFRESH() * Hide or reset other state-specific controls as well    ENDCASE         THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser1.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser2.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser3.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser4.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser5.ALIGNMENT = 0    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.lbluser6.ALIGNMENT = 0 ENDIF  ENDPROC PROCEDURE chkrefresh WITH THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3    IF wells.lcompress       .txtnCompress.lenabled = .T.    ELSE       .txtnCompress.lenabled = .F.    ENDIF     IF wells.lgather       .txtnGather.lenabled = .T.    ELSE       .txtnGather.lenabled = .F.    ENDIF ENDWITH ENDPROC PROCEDURE enablepermits TRY    DO CASE       CASE wells.nwellcount = 1          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit6.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit5.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit4.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit3.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit2.lEnabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.txtPermit1.lEnabled = .T. ENDCASE     DO CASE       CASE wells.nwellcount = 1          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra6.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra5.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra4.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra3.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra2.lenabled = .F.          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page7.cnra1.lenabled = .T. ENDCASE CATCH TO loError    MESSAGEBOX('Error: ' + loerror.message + CHR(13) + ;               'Line:  ' + TRANSFORM(loerror.lineno),16,'Error') ENDTRY  ENDPROC PROCEDURE Init LPARAMETERS lcWellID  IF DODEFAULT()    IF FILE('datafiles\northwood.txt')       THISFORM.lnorthwood = .T. THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page2.CmdWVDataButton.VISIBLE = .F.     THISFORM.loadleases() ENDIF  ENDPROC PROCEDURE list LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lcList, lnRecNo, llDontMove PRIV llOK  IF thisform.lnorthwood    thisform.listnorthwood()    RETURN ENDIF   llOK = .F. llDontMove = .F.  lcList = 'cwellid,cwellname,cgroup,cwellstat'  SELECT wells lnRecNo = RECNO()  IF thisform.cmdatamanager.isnew('Wells')    llDontMove = .T. ENDIF  IF this.flushcontrolbuffer() AND this.beforenav('Wells')    DO FORM custom\picklist WITH 'Wells', lcList, thisform.txtwellid.value, 4 ELSE    RETURN     ENDIF     IF NOT llOK    IF NOT llDontMove       TRY           SELECT wells          GOTO lnRecNo       CATCH       ENDTRY     ENDIF     ELSE    thisform.lrunafternav = .t.     THISFORM.cmdatamanager.afternav('Wells')    thisform.loadleases() ENDIF     THISFORM.REFRESH()         ENDPROC PROCEDURE listnorthwood LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lcList, lnRecNo, llDontMove PRIV llOK  llOK = .F. llDontMove = .F.  lcList = 'cwellid,cwellname,cpermit1,ccounty,ctownship,cgroup,cwellstat'  SELECT wells lnRecNo = RECNO()  IF thisform.cmdatamanager.isnew('Wells')    llDontMove = .T. ENDIF         IF this.flushcontrolbuffer() AND this.beforenav('Wells')    DO FORM custom\picklist WITH 'Wells', lcList, thisform.txtwellid.value, 7 ELSE    RETURN     ENDIF     IF NOT llOK    IF NOT llDontMove       TRY           SELECT wells          GOTO lnRecNo       CATCH       ENDTRY     ENDIF     ELSE    thisform.lrunafternav = .t.    THISFORM.cmdatamanager.afternav('Wells')    thisform.loadleases() ENDIF     THISFORM.REFRESH()         ENDPROC PROCEDURE loadleases LOCAL lcWellID, llAlarm  llAlarm = .f.  * Clear the list before starting THISFORM.lstleases.CLEAR()  lcWellID = wells.cwellid lnI      = 1 SWSELECT('leasewell') SCAN FOR cwellid == lcWellID 	m.cLeaseID = cLeaseID 	SELECT land 	SET ORDER TO cLeaseID 	IF SEEK(m.cLeaseID) 		m.cLeaseName = cLeaseName 		THISFORM.lstleases.ADDLISTITEM(m.cLeaseID + ' - ' + m.cLeaseName, lnI, 1) 		lnI = lnI + 1 		IF land.lLegal 		   IF NOT llAlarm               MESSAGEBOX("There's a legal matter pending for the " + ALLTRIM(land.cleasename) + " lease! See the lease notes.",48,'Legal Matter Pending')               llAlarm = .t.            ENDIF         ENDIF  	ENDIF ENDSCAN   ENDPROC PROCEDURE purchaserdesc IF NOT EMPTY(wells.crevbbl)    SELECT revsrc    LOCATE FOR crevkey = wells.crevbbl    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtoilproddesc.VALUE = crevname    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtoilproddesc.REFRESH() ELSE    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtoilproddesc.VALUE = ''    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtoilproddesc.REFRESH() ENDIF  IF NOT EMPTY(wells.crevmcf)    SELECT revsrc    LOCATE FOR crevkey = wells.crevmcf    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtgasproddesc.VALUE = crevname    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtgasproddesc.REFRESH() ELSE    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtgasproddesc.VALUE = ''    THISFORM.pgfPageFrame1.page3.txtgasproddesc.REFRESH() ENDIF  SELECT wells ENDPROC PROCEDURE setstate this.lChanged = .T. m.goStateManager.RefreshAll('Form Edit') ENDPROC PROCEDURE viewdocument LOCAL lnReturn, llReturn, lcOutputFile LOCAL liKey, lcPath  liKey = INT(VAL(thisform.pgfpageframe1.page6.lstDocuments.value))  swselect('documents') SET ORDER TO iDocPK IF SEEK(liKey)    lcOutputFile = cPath      llReturn = .T.     IF NOT FILE(lcOutputFile)       llReturn = .F.    ENDIF     TRY       IF llReturn          DECLARE INTEGER ShellExecute IN "Shell32.dll" ;             INTEGER HWND, ;             STRING lpVerb, ;             STRING lpFile, ;             STRING lpParameters, ;             STRING lpDirectory, ;             LONG nShowCmd           lnReturn = ShellExecute(0, "Open", lcOutputFile, "", "", 1)       ENDIF        THIS.nReturnValue = lnReturn        IF lnReturn > 32          llReturn = .T.       ELSE          llReturn = .F.       ENDIF    CATCH TO loError    ENDTRY     RETURN (llReturn)  ENDIF ENDPROC PROCEDURE viewmap * ShowWindow flag. See complete list below. #DEFINE SW_SHOWNORMAL 1  LOCAL lnReturn, llReturn, lcURL lcWellName = ALLTRIM(wells.cwellname) lcLatitude = wells.clatitude lcLongitude = wells.clongitude  IF EMPTY(lcLatitude)    lcLatitude = '40.001658'    lcLongitude = '-83.019755'    lcWellname = 'The Ohio State University' ENDIF      lcWellName = STRTRAN(lcwellname,'#','') lcWellName = STRTRAN(lcWellName,' ','+')     lcURL = 'http://maps.google.com/maps?q=' + ALLTRIM(lclatitude) + ',+' + ALLTRIM(lclongitude) + '+(' + ;    lcwellname + ')&iwloc=A&hl=en'   llReturn = .T.  TRY    IF llReturn       DECLARE INTEGER ShellExecute IN "Shell32.dll" ;          INTEGER HWND, ;          STRING lpVerb, ;          STRING lpFile, ;          STRING lpParameters, ;          STRING lpDirectory, ;          LONG nShowCmd        lnReturn = ShellExecute(0, "Open", lcURL, "", "", 1)    ENDIF     THIS.nReturnValue = lnReturn     IF lnReturn > 32       llReturn = .T.    ELSE       llReturn = .F.    ENDIF CATCH TO loError ENDTRY  RETURN (llReturn)     ENDPROC PROCEDURE well_on_hold * * Checks the wellinv table to see if all owners are marked on hold * LOCAL lnHolds lnHolds = 0  swselect('wellinv') SCAN FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND NOT lonHold     swselect('investor')    SET ORDER to cownerid    IF SEEK(wellinv.cownerid) AND NOT lIntegGL       lnHolds = lnHolds + 1    ENDIF  ENDSCAN   swselect('wellinv') COUNT FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid TO lnInts  IF lnHolds = 0 AND lnInts > 0    llHeld = .T. ELSE    llHeld = .F. ENDIF  IF llHeld    THISFORM.cmdHold.CAPTION = 'Release Well' ELSE    THISFORM.cmdHold.CAPTION = 'Suspend Well' ENDIF     ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.afternav LPARAMETERS cworkarea  IF m.cworkarea = 'Wells' AND THISFORM.lrunafternav    lcWellID = wells.cWellID    THISFORM.CAPTION = 'Well Information - (' + ALLTRIM(wells.cwellname) + ')'    THISFORM.chkrefresh()    THISFORM.purchaserdesc()    THISFORM.ChangeUserLabels()     IF m.goapp.lDocuments       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page6.lstDocuments.REQUERY()    ENDIF     = REQUERY('well_owners')    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page3.cboOwnerID.CLEAR()    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page3.cboOwnerID.REQUERY()    THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page3.cboOwnerID.REFRESH()  * Load in the leases attached to this well    THISFORM.LoadLeases()     IF wells.lusesev = .T.  &&  Marked to use these rates insted of severance tax table, so enable the rate boxes       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtNroysevo.SET('enabled', .T.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnroysevg.SET('enabled', .T.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnwrksevo.SET('enabled', .T.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnwrksevg.SET('enabled', .T.)    ELSE       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtNroysevo.SET('enabled', .F.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnroysevg.SET('enabled', .F.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnwrksevo.SET('enabled', .F.)       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.txtnwrksevg.SET('enabled', .F.)    ENDIF  * Enable/Disable API Numbers and NRA Numbers    THISFORM.EnablePermits()     THISFORM.coldgroup = wells.cgroup     IF wells.cstate = 'WV'       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page7.ENABLED = .T.    ELSE       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.page7.ENABLED = .F.       IF THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.ACTIVEPAGE = 7          THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.ACTIVEPAGE = 1       ENDIF    ENDIF      THISFORM.well_on_hold()  *!*	   swselect('Notes') *!*	   SET ORDER to cLeaseID *!*	   lcLeaseID = land.cleaseid *!*	   IF SEEK(lcLeaseID) *!*	      thisform.pgfpageframecustom1.page4.edtnOtes.Refresh() *!*	   ELSE *!*	      m.cLeaseID = lcLeaseID *!*	      m.mNotes = ' ' *!*	      INSERT INTO notes FROM Memvar *!*	      thisform.pgfpageframecustom1.Page4.edtNotes.Refresh() *!*	   ENDIF     THISFORM.lrunafternav = .F.     IF NOT wells.lsev1o       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.check1.SET('Enabled',.T.)    ELSE       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.check1.SET('Enabled',.F.)    ENDIF    IF NOT wells.lsev1g       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.Check2.SET('Enabled',.T.)    ELSE       THISFORM.pgfpageframe1.Page4.Check2.SET('Enabled',.F.)    ENDIF ENDIF  RETURN .T.  ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.afternew LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lcgroup lcgroup = '00'  SELECT groups  &&  Don't fill in 00 as the group when adding a new record if they've been dumb, and deleted it.  Instead, just use the first group in the list. LOCATE FOR cGroup = '00' AND NOT DELETED() IF NOT FOUND()    SET ORDER TO cGroup    GO TOP    lcgroup = cGroup ENDIF SELECT wells  WITH THISFORM.PGFPAGEFRAME1    THISFORM.cmdatamanager.REPLACE('wells','cmeterid','')    .page2.txtcmeterid.REFRESH    REPLACE cwellid   WITH '', ;       cwellname WITH '', ;       lthird_prty WITH .F., ;       lcompress   WITH .F., ;       lGather     WITH .F., ;       lSection29  WITH .F., ;       nprocess    WITH 1, ;       nwellcount  WITH 1, ;       cwellstat   WITH 'A', ;       cGroup      WITH lcgroup, ;       dAdded      WITH DATETIME(), ;       caddedby    WITH m.goapp.cuser    .page3.txtnCompress.lENABLED = .F.    .page3.txtnGather.lENABLED = .F.    .page3.txtoilproddesc.VALUE = ''    .page3.txtoilproddesc.REFRESH()    .page3.txtgasproddesc.VALUE = ''    .page3.txtgasproddesc.REFRESH()    .page1.REFRESH()    .page2.REFRESH()    .page3.REFRESH()    .page4.REFRESH()    .page5.REFRESH()    IF m.goapp.lDocuments       .page6.REFRESH()    ENDIF        .ACTIVEPAGE = 1    THISFORM.SetNextControl(thisform.txtwellid) ENDWITH RETURN .T.  ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.beforedelete LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lcWellID, lnCount  if not used('expense')    use expense in 0 endif    SELECT expense LOCATE FOR cWellID == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been expenses entered using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  if not used('income')    use income in 0 endif    SELECT income LOCATE FOR cWellID == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been income entered using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  if not used('glmaster')    use glmaster in 0 endif    SELECT glmaster LOCATE FOR cUnitNo == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been journal entries posted using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  if not used('disbhist')    use disbhist in 0 endif    SELECT disbhist LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been history entries made using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  if not used('suspense')    use suspense in 0 endif    SELECT suspense LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid IF FOUND()    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There have been suspense entries made using this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  lcWellId = wells.cwellid =REQUERY('well_owners') SELECT well_owners COUNT FOR NOT DELETED() TO lnCount IF lnCount <> 0    THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('There has been division of interests created for this well.  It cannot be deleted.')    RETURN .F. ENDIF  RETURN dodefault(cworkarea)   ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.beforenav LPARAMETERS cWorkarea     thisform.lrunafternav = .t. ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.beforenew LPARAMETERS cworkarea LOCAL lnWells   lnwells = 0 swselect('wells', 'wells1') SELECT wells1 COUNT FOR NOT DELETED() AND cwellstat <> 'U' TO lnwells IF lnwells = m.goapp.nWells    MESSAGEBOX('There is a maximum of ' + TRANSFORM(m.goapp.nWells) + ' in this edition of Pivoten Financials allowed. ' + CHR(10) + ;         'You cannot add additional wells until you upgrade to the next level.', 0, THISFORM.CAPTION)    RETURN .F. ENDIF    ENDPROC PROCEDURE cmdatamanager.beforeupdate LPARAMETERS cworkarealist  IF m.goapp.lQBVersion    SELECT wells1    COUNT FOR NOT DELETED() AND cwellstat <> 'U' TO lnwells    IF m.goApp.capplevel = 'Basic' AND lnwells > 20       IF wells.cwellstat <> 'U'          MESSAGEBOX('This is a basic version. 20 wells is the maximum number of wells allowed. ' + CHR(10) + ;          'You cannot add additional wells until you upgrade to the next level.',0,'Basic Version')          RETURN .F.       ENDIF     ENDIF ENDIF      IF THISFORM.coldgroup <> wells.cgroup    IF NOT USED('suspense')       USE suspense IN 0    ENDIF    SELECT suspense    COUNT FOR cWellID == wells.cWellID AND cgroup == THISFORM.coldgroup TO lnx    IF lnx > 0       IF THISFORM.omessage.CONFIRM('This well has suspense entries associated with group: ' + THISFORM.coldgroup + ;             ' Changing the group will affect the suspense balances reported when past owner statements are reprinted.' + ;             ' Do you want to continue and change those entries to this new group: ' + wells.cgroup+'?')          SELECT suspense          SCAN FOR suspense.cWellID == wells.cWellID AND suspense.cgroup == THISFORM.coldgroup             REPLACE cgroup WITH wells.cgroup          ENDSCAN       ELSE          THISFORM.omessage.warning('The changes were not saved.')          RETURN .F.       ENDIF    ENDIF ENDIF  IF NOT this.isnew('Wells')    SELECT wells    REPLACE dchanged WITH DATETIME(), ;            cChangedBy WITH m.goapp.cuser ENDIF                         THISFORM.coldgroup = wells.cgroup  &&  When saved, set the cOldGroup variable, so if they change the group for a well multiple times without changing recs, it will work  RETURN .T.  ENDPROC

CASE thisform.txtstate.Value = 'WV'          thisform.pgfpageframe1.page2.CmdWVDataButton.Visible = .t. ELSE    this.txtnroysevo.set('enabled',.f.)    this.txtnroysevg.set('enabled',.f.)    this.txtnwrksevo.set('enabled',.f.)    this.txtnwrksevg.set('enabled',.f.) ENDIF        ENDPROC PROCEDURE Page6.Activate IF m.goApp.lCloudDocs    this.cmdTreeno.Visible = .t. ELSE    this.cmdTreeno.Visible = .f. ENDIF thisform.lstLeases.Refresh() RETURN DODEFAULT()    ENDPROC PROCEDURE Page7.Activate IF DODEFAULT()    thisform.EnablePermits() ENDIF  ENDPROC

controls.name: cmdLookMeter
controls.label: PROCEDURE Click local nMeterNo  nMeterNo = thisform.nMeterNo  LOCAL lcList, lnRecNo PRIV llOK  IF TYPE('nMeterNo') <> 'N'    nMeterNo = 1 ENDIF  DO CASE    CASE nMeterNo = 1       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID.VALUE    CASE nMeterNo = 2       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID2.VALUE    CASE nMeterNo = 3       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID3.VALUE       CASE nMeterNo = 4       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID4.VALUE      CASE nMeterNo = 5       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID5.VALUE       OTHERWISE       lcValue = THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID.VALUE ENDCASE  llOK = .F. lcList = 'cmeterid/meterid,cmeterdesc/meterdesc'  DO FORM picklist WITH 'Meters', lcList, lcValue, 2  IF llOK    DO CASE       CASE nMeterNo = 1          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)       CASE nMeterNo = 2          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID2.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)       CASE nMeterNo = 3          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID3.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)       CASE nMeterNo = 4          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID4.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)          CASE nMeterNo = 5          THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID5.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)          OTHERWISE              THIS.PARENT.txtcMeterID.SET('value',meters.cMeterID)    ENDCASE ENDIF   ENDPROC

Do you want to continue to mark the well as exempt from tax 1 which will zero out the rates?')       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lusesev',.f.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','nroysevo',0)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','nroysevg',0)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','nwrksevo',0)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','nwrksevg',0)       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.chkTaxexempt1.Refresh()       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.txtnroysevo.Refresh()       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.txtnroysevg.Refresh()       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.txtnwrksevo.Refresh()       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page4.txtnwrksevg.Refresh()    ELSE       this.Value = .f.    ENDIF  ENDIF  DODEFAULT() ENDPROC

controls.name: chkLusesev
controls.label: PROCEDURE Click  IF wells.ltaxexempt1 AND this.value    IF thisform.omessage.confirm('This well is marked exempt from tax 1. These rates override the tax 1 calculations ' + ;                                 'for oil & gas. Do you want to do this and mark the well as non exempt from tax 1?')       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Ltaxexempt1',.f.)       thisform.pgfpageframe1.page5.chkTaxexempt1.Refresh()    ELSE       this.Value = .f.    ENDIF  ENDIF   IF THIS.VALUE AND NOT EMPTY(wells.cTable)  &&  Already a tax table specified, so warn them, and don't let them choose it    messagebox('There is a tax table assigned to this well. This option ' + ;               'will replace the tax table tax 1 calculation for oil & gas. ' + ;               'This option should normally only be used for calculating ' + ;               'Montana tribal taxes.',48,'Important tax calculation information') ENDIF  IF this.Parent.chkroysevtx.value    MESSAGEBOX('This option cannot be enabled when the option to exempt royalty owners from taxes is enabled.',16,'Conflicting Option')    this.Value = .f. ENDIF   IF THIS.VALUE    THIS.PARENT.txtnroysevo.ENABLED = .T.    THIS.PARENT.txtnroysevg.ENABLED = .T.    THIS.PARENT.txtnwrksevo.ENABLED = .T.    THIS.PARENT.txtnwrksevg.ENABLED = .T. ELSE    THIS.PARENT.txtnroysevo.ENABLED = .F.    THIS.PARENT.txtnroysevg.ENABLED = .F.    THIS.PARENT.txtnwrksevo.ENABLED = .F.    THIS.PARENT.txtnwrksevg.ENABLED = .F. ENDIF    ENDPROC

controls.name: cmdTreeno
controls.label: PROCEDURE Click LOCAL loTS  loTS = m.goApp.oTreeno  IF loTS.Login()    * Get the cabinet ID, needed for the other calls    lnCabinetID = loTS.GetCabinetID("Wells") && ex. "Leases", "Wells"     IF m.lnCabinetID = -1       MESSAGEBOX('Error Accessing Treeno:' + CHR(10) + loTS.cErrorMsg,48,'Treeno Problem')       RETURN    ENDIF     * Check to see if the folder already exists    * Not a great example because if you did a search for a company named "Test"    * a company like "Test Company" would match. The assumption is this    * field contains a unique value. If that ends up being a bad assumption    * you could iterate over the loTS.oMatches and do a more exact match.    *lnMatches = loTS.SearchCabinet(lnCabinetID, "company_name", "Test Company") && ex. lease_number or well_id    lnMatches = loTS.SearchCabinet(lnCabinetID, "well_id", wells.cwellid) && ex. lease_number or well_id     IF lnMatches = -1       MESSAGEBOX('Error Accessing Treeno:' + CHR(10) + loTS.cErrorMsg,48,'Treeno Problem')       RETURN    ENDIF     * If the folder doesn't exist, create it    IF lnMatches = 0       * Folder Not found       IF MESSAGEBOX('The folder for well: ' + wells.cwellid + ' does not exist in Treeno. Do you want to create it?',36,'Access Treeno') = 6          CREATE CURSOR curfolder (well_id C(10), well_name C(40), api_number C(20), county C(30), township C(20), status C(1), lease_id c(10))          SWSELECT('leasewell')          SELECT cLeaseID FROM leasewell WHERE  cwellid == wells.cwellid INTO CURSOR templease ORDER BY cleaseid          INSERT INTO curfolder (well_id, well_name, api_number, county, township, status, lease_id) ;             VALUES (wells.cwellid, wells.cwellname, wells.cpermit1, wells.ccounty, wells.ctownship, wells.cwellstat, templease.cleaseid)           llCreated = loTS.CreateFolder(thisform.DataSessionId, m.lnCabinetID, "curFolder")           IF !m.llCreated             MESSAGEBOX('Error Accessing Treeno:' + CHR(10) + loTS.cErrorMsg,48,'Treeno Problem')          ENDIF       ELSE          RETURN       ENDIF    ENDIF     swselect('options')    GO TOP     lcUser = ALLTRIM(cTreenoUser)    lcPassword = ALLTRIM(cmEncrypt(options.cTreenoPwd,'SherWareKey_@8@2899909'))    * Now open the website up to this folder    loTS.LaunchWebsite(lcUser, lcPassword, "Wells", "well_id", wells.cwellid) ELSE    MESSAGEBOX('Unable to login to Treeno. Check your user name and password in the Cloud Doc Mgmt preferences and try again.',16,'Treeno Login Problem')       ENDIF  ENDPROC

controls.label: PROCEDURE Valid LOCAL lcWellID  lcWellID = THIS.VALUE  IF NOT EMPTY(lcWellID) AND lcWellID <> wells.cwellid    SELECT wells1    SET DELETED OFF    SET ORDER TO cwellid    IF SEEK(lcWellID)       IF NOT DELETED()          IF THISFORM.omessage.CONFIRM('There is already a well with this ID.  Would you like to view the existing record?')             THISFORM.cmdatamanager.revertall()             SELECT wells             SET ORDER TO cwellid             SEEK(lcWellID)             THISFORM.REFRESH()          ELSE             THIS.VALUE = ''             RETURN 0          ENDIF       ELSE          THISFORM.cmdatamanager.revertall()          SELECT wells          SET ORDER TO cwellid          SEEK(lcWellID)          SCATTER MEMVAR BLANK MEMO          GATHER MEMVAR MEMO          RECALL          THIS.SET('value',lcWellID)          REPLACE nprocess    WITH 1, ;             cwellstat   WITH 'A', ;             cGroup      WITH '00'          THISFORM.REFRESH()       ENDIF       SELECT wells    ENDIF ENDIF  SET DELETED ON  RETURN DODEFAULT()    ENDPROC

controls.name: cboTable
controls.label: PROCEDURE Requery IF DODEFAULT()    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('  ',1)     SELECT cTable FROM sevtax INTO ARRAY laTaxes     IF _TALLY > 0       FOR lnX = 1 TO _TALLY          THIS.ADDLISTITEM(laTaxes[lnX],lnX+1)       ENDFOR       this.Refresh()    ENDIF ENDIF  ENDPROC PROCEDURE Valid IF DODEFAULT()     *Don't let them have both a tax table, and the option about using the rates instead of a tax table marked    IF NOT EMPTY(this.Value) AND wells.lUseSev         thisform.oMessage.Warning('You currently have the option marked on the Taxes tab to specify the rates instead of using a tax table.  In order to select a tax table, first un-mark that option.')       this.set('value','')          ENDIF        * Don't let them set this option if it's a 3rd party well    IF NOT EMPTY(this.value) AND wells.lThird_prty         THISFORM.oMessage.Warning('You cannot specify a tax table for this well because it is marked as a 3rd party well, which means you are not liable for paying the taxes being withheld.')       this.set('value','')    ENDIF     IF NOT EMPTY(this.Value) AND ;       (wells.lsev1o OR wells.lsev2o OR wells.lsev3o OR wells.lsev4o OR ;        wells.lsev1g OR wells.lsev2g OR wells.lsev3g OR wells.lsev4g OR ;        wells.lsev1p OR wells.lsev2p OR wells.lsev3p OR wells.lsev4p)              thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev1o',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev2o',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev3o',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev4o',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev1g',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev2g',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev3g',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev4g',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev1p',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev2p',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev3p',.F.)       thisform.cmdatamanager.replace('Wells','Lsev4p',.F.)    ENDIF     ENDIF        ENDPROC

controls.label: PROCEDURE Init THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Active',1,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('A',1,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Inactive',2,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('I',2,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Plugged',3,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('P',3,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Sold',4,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('S',4,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Shut In',5,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('N',5,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Permitted',6,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('T',6,2) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Spudded',7,1) THIS.ADDLISTITEM('D',7,2)  IF m.goApp.lAMVersion    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Investment',8,1)    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('V',8,2) ENDIF  IF m.goapp.lQBVersion    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('Not Used',8,1)    THIS.ADDLISTITEM('U',8,2) ENDIF      THIS.REFRESH()  DODEFAULT() ENDPROC PROCEDURE Valid LOCAL llFound  IF INLIST(THIS.VALUE,'I','V','S','P') AND INLIST(wells.cWellStat,'A','N','T','D')  &&  If changing it from active to some other status, check the allocation files and new run, and warn them if there's items in there     SELECT expsusp    LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND NOT DELETED()    IF FOUND()       llFound = .T.    ENDIF    SELECT incsusp    LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND NOT DELETED()    IF FOUND()       llFound = .T.    ENDIF    IF llFound = .T.       THISFORM.oMessage.Warning("You are changing this well from being an active well, but there is income or expenses in the allocation file which won't get processed unless the well is active.")    ENDIF     llFound = .F.    SELECT income    LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND nrunno = 0    IF FOUND()       llFound = .T.    ENDIF    SELECT expense    LOCATE FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid AND nrunnorev = 0 AND nrunnojib = 0 AND cyear <> 'FIXD'    IF FOUND()       llFound = .T.    ENDIF    IF llFound = .T.       THISFORM.oMessage.Warning("You are changing this well from being an active well, but there is income or expenses in the New Run which won't get processed unless the well is active.")    ENDIF ENDIF  * Warn the user that chaning a well to a status of "Not Used" is irreversible IF THIS.VALUE = 'U'    IF NOT THISFORM.oMessage.CONFIRM('Changing the well status to Not Used locks this well. It cannot be changed back to active. Do you want to continue?')       this.refresh()       RETURN .F.    ENDIF ENDIF  * Can't change the well status of Not Used to anything else. IF THIS.VALUE <> 'U' AND wells.cWellStat = 'U'    THISFORM.oMessage.severe('A well marked as Not Used cannot be changed to any other status.')    this.refresh()    RETURN .F. ENDIF  IF THIS.Value = 'V' AND wells.cwellstat # 'V'    MESSAGEBOX("Investment wells do not flow through a Revenue Distribution or Joint Interest Billing. " + ;               "They are wells you don't operate and don't set up a DOI for." + ;               "In order to get some of the well reports for an investment well you'll need to run " + ;               "the Build History for Investment Wells found under the Utilities menu.",48,thisform.Caption) ENDIF                  DODEFAULT()  ENDPROC

controls.name: cmdLease
controls.label: PROCEDURE Click LOCAL m.cWellID  m.cWellID = thisform.txtwellid.Value   DO FORM dmsellease WITH m.cWellID  SELECT leasesel COUNT FOR NOT DELETED() TO lnCount        IF lnCount > 0    SELECT cLeaseID, .F. as lExists FROM leasesel INTO CURSOR leaselink readwrite        * Find out if lease is already attached to this well    SELECT leaselink    SCAN        SCATTER MEMVAR        SELECT leasewell       LOCATE FOR cwellid == m.cwellid AND cleaseid == m.cleaseid       IF FOUND()          SELECT leaselink          REPLACE lExists WITH .t.       ENDIF    ENDSCAN      * Only add leases not already attached    SELECT leaselink    SCAN FOR NOT lExists       SCATTER MEMVAR        INSERT INTO leasewell FROM memvar    ENDSCAN        * Remove leases no longer attached to this well    SWSELECT('leasewell')    SCAN FOR cwellid == m.cwellid       m.cLeaseID = cLeaseID       SELECT leaselink       LOCATE FOR cLeaseID == m.cLeaseID       IF NOT FOUND()          SELECT leasewell          DELETE NEXT 1       ENDIF    ENDSCAN         thisform.lstleases.Clear()        lnI = 1    SWSELECT('leasewell')    SCAN FOR cWellID == m.cWellID       m.cLeaseID = cLeaseID       SELECT land       SET ORDER to cLeaseID       IF SEEK(m.cLeaseID)          m.cLeaseName = cLeaseName          thisform.lstLeases.AddListItem(m.cLeaseID + ' - ' + m.cLeaseName,lnI,1)          lnI = lnI + 1       ENDIF    ENDSCAN     thisform.setstate() ELSE    swselect('leasewell')    DELETE FOR cwellid == m.cWellID    thisform.setstate()       ENDIF  ENDPROC

controls.name: cmdHold
controls.label: PROCEDURE Click swselect('investor') SET ORDER TO cownerid swselect('wellinv',.T.) IF THIS.CAPTION = 'Suspend Well'    IF THISFORM.omessage.CONFIRM('This will mark all owner interests as held in the division of interests for this well. Continue?')       SELECT wellinv       SCAN FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid          SELECT investor          IF SEEK(wellinv.cownerid) AND linteggl             LOOP          ENDIF          SELECT wellinv          REPLACE lonhold WITH .T.       ENDSCAN       TABLEUPDATE(.T.)       MESSAGEBOX('All interests in this well have been placed on hold. ' + CHR(10) + CHR(10) +;          'Changing the division of interests manually by taking ' + CHR(10) + ;          'an interest off hold will change this button to say ' + CHR(10) + ;          '"Suspend Well" again.',64,'Release Well')    ENDIF ELSE    IF THISFORM.omessage.CONFIRM('This will mark all owner interests as not held in the division of interests for this well. Continue?')       SELECT wellinv        SCAN FOR cwellid == wells.cwellid          REPLACE lonhold WITH .F.       ENDSCAN       TABLEUPDATE(.T.)       MESSAGEBOX('All interests in this well have been taken off hold. ' + CHR(10) + CHR(10) +;          'Changing the division of interests manually by placing ' + CHR(10) + ;          'an interest on hold will change this button to say ' + CHR(10) + ;          '"Release Well" again.',64,'Release Well')    ENDIF ENDIF  THISFORM.well_on_hold()  ENDPROC
